Package opencard.opt.util

Class Summary
OpenCardPropertyFileLoader OpenCardPropertyFileLoader is a utility class that loads the opencard.properties file and merges the properties found in there with the system properties.
PassThruCardService A card service for low level communication with smartcards.
PassThruCardServiceFactory A factory for creating low level card services for any smartcard.
Tag This class represents Tags as defined in the Basic Encoding Rules for ASN.1 defined in ISO 8825.
TLV This class represents a TLV (Tag Length Value) structure.
URLClassLoader Special class loader for loading classes from a URL.
